user.title: Sol-Ark Cloud Setup
user.description: Connect to your Sol-Ark Cloud account. You'll need your MySolArk credentials and Plant ID.

data_description.email: The email address you use to log into MySolArk
data_description.plant_id: Your Plant ID from the MySolArk URL (e.g., 12345)
data_description.base_url: API endpoint URL. Use default unless you have connection issues.
data_description.auth_mode: Authentication method. 'Auto' tries all methods automatically.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to update data (30-3600 seconds).

error.cannot_connect:
Cannot connect to Sol-Ark Cloud. Please check:
• Your internet connection
• The Base URL setting
• Sol-Ark servers may be down

Details: {error}
error.invalid_auth:
Authentication failed. Please verify:
• Your email address is correct
• Your password is correct
• Your MySolArk account is active
• You can log in at www.mysolark.com

Details: {error}
error.invalid_plant_id:
Cannot access Plant ID. Please verify:
• The Plant ID is correct (check your MySolArk URL)
• You have permission to view this plant
• The plant is active in your MySolArk account

Details: {error}

abort.already_configured: This Plant ID is already configured.

init.title: Sol-Ark Cloud Options
init.description: Update settings for your Sol-Ark Cloud integration.

data_description.base_url: API endpoint URL. Try the alternative if you experience connection issues.
data_description.auth_mode: Authentication method. Switch to 'Legacy' if 'Auto' fails.
